lexUnit.name: modify.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: make partial changes to (something) in order to improve it or lessen its severity

sentence.text: The European microelectronics picture was somewhat modified by the parallel decisions of three European champions ( discussed above ) to reemphasize vertical integration .
